alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 9:09PM PST until January 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 3 PM PST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 9 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Stevens Pass, Stehekin, and Holden Village. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to 3 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start as snow Thursday mixing with freezing rain near Stevens Pass Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
